name: Kongregate ( Big Screen Game, Hide Chat )
description: The game Screen in Kongregate Games is now a lot bigger and the Chat is hidden. Minimum resolution supported is 1440x900, if your screen is less than 900 pixel high then the game won't fit! I tested it only in Soccer Physics, so I don't know how it works for other games. Give me some feedbacks / requests! If you like this please comment and give me some feedback, it would be a great motivation! Thanks.
